paragraphs.text: This page requires editing to meet Avatar Wiki's quality standards.

paragraphs.body: Cut to a text crawl, which is narrated by Katara.
paragraphs.text: Cut to a text crawl, which is narrated by Katara.

paragraphs.body: Zuko manages to get out of the holding room and came to the upper deck with his men. Aang spun around and turned his staff into a glider.
paragraphs.text: Zuko manages to get out of the holding room and came to the upper deck with his men. Aang spun around and turned his staff into a glider.

paragraphs.body: Zhao spots Zuko on his ship out in the sea
paragraphs.text: Zhao spots Zuko on his ship out in the sea

paragraphs.body: Appa lands in a forest in the Southern Earth Kingdom, where Katara, Sokka and Aang set up camp. Momo, the winged lemur, has become. Aang sits alone making sense of what he saw at the temple and the Spirit World.
paragraphs.text: Appa lands in a forest in the Southern Earth Kingdom, where Katara, Sokka and Aang set up camp. Momo, the winged lemur, has become. Aang sits alone making sense of what he saw at the temple and the Spirit World.

paragraphs.body: Meanwhile, Zuko and two soldiers, disguised as travelers of the Earth Kingdom, visit the first village Aang liberated. They also enter the former prison camp and look around.
paragraphs.text: Meanwhile, Zuko and two soldiers, disguised as travelers of the Earth Kingdom, visit the first village Aang liberated. They also enter the former prison camp and look around.

paragraphs.body: Aang is later hung from chains in a prayer room in the Northern Air Temple. Aang closes his eyes and entered the Spirit World.
paragraphs.text: Aang is later hung from chains in a prayer room in the Northern Air Temple. Aang closes his eyes and entered the Spirit World.

paragraphs.body: Aang takes care of Zuko till the next morning, then left Zuko still unconscious by the camp-fire in the forest, leaping from tree to tree.
paragraphs.text: Aang takes care of Zuko till the next morning, then left Zuko still unconscious by the camp-fire in the forest, leaping from tree to tree.

paragraphs.body: A few days later, Zhao arrives at the Fire Nation palace, being summoned into the throne room.
paragraphs.text: A few days later, Zhao arrives at the Fire Nation palace, being summoned into the throne room.

paragraphs.body: Katara and Aang has attend a waterbending class taught by Pakku.
paragraphs.text: Katara and Aang has attend a waterbending class taught by Pakku.

paragraphs.body: On the Fire Nation flagship that leads the rest of fleet, Iroh meets with Zhao on the upper deck.
paragraphs.text: On the Fire Nation flagship that leads the rest of fleet, Iroh meets with Zhao on the upper deck.

paragraphs.body: Sokka takes Aang into the balcony room, to see Yue, who oversees the Fire Nation armada with Katara.
paragraphs.text: Sokka takes Aang into the balcony room, to see Yue, who oversees the Fire Nation armada with Katara.

paragraphs.body: As the large city bell was rung, the Northern Water Tribe residents hurriedly seek for shelter all over the city. Soldiers were seen lining up on the fort walls, overlooking the large Fire Nation fleet nearing its attack range. As Pakku gives out the battle cry, the soldiers rattled the end of their spears against the icy floor for morale.
paragraphs.text: As the large city bell was rung, the Northern Water Tribe residents hurriedly seek for shelter all over the city. Soldiers were seen lining up on the fort walls, overlooking the large Fire Nation fleet nearing its attack range. As Pakku gives out the battle cry, the soldiers rattled the end of their spears against the icy floor for morale.

paragraphs.body: Iroh enters the war room on Zhao's ship.
paragraphs.text: Iroh enters the war room on Zhao's ship.

paragraphs.body: Sokka came back to the spiritual place with Yue, and found Katara lying unconscious near the tree. He woke her up.
paragraphs.text: Sokka came back to the spiritual place with Yue, and found Katara lying unconscious near the tree. He woke her up.

paragraphs.body: Just outside the stronghold, a firebender concentrates a large flame through a nozzle on a ship to breach the fort wall. He succeeds in creating a hole, which is large enough for Fire Nation soldiers and Komodo rhino-riders to freely enter the city. Master Pakku waterbends the soldiers in the courtyard. Cut back to the flagship.
paragraphs.text: Just outside the stronghold, a firebender concentrates a large flame through a nozzle on a ship to breach the fort wall. He succeeds in creating a hole, which is large enough for Fire Nation soldiers and Komodo rhino-riders to freely enter the city. Master Pakku waterbends the soldiers in the courtyard. Cut back to the flagship.

paragraphs.body: Katara follows Sokka and Yue back into the city, with the battle ongoing.
paragraphs.text: Katara follows Sokka and Yue back into the city, with the battle ongoing.

paragraphs.body: As the fight between Aang and Zuko turns into a standoff, they notice that room is rumbling. The water in the barrels begin to shake, then spirals to Zuko encasing him in ice. Aang turns to see Katara, who completes her waterbending move.
paragraphs.text: As the fight between Aang and Zuko turns into a standoff, they notice that room is rumbling. The water in the barrels begin to shake, then spirals to Zuko encasing him in ice. Aang turns to see Katara, who completes her waterbending move.

paragraphs.body: With the Moon power gone, more Fire Nation soldiers pour into city through three breaches now made on the fort walls.
paragraphs.text: With the Moon power gone, more Fire Nation soldiers pour into city through three breaches now made on the fort walls.

paragraphs.body: Zhao is on a bridge, seemingly in despair of his failure of killing the Moon, when Zuko steps out from the mist, walking toward him.
paragraphs.text: Zhao is on a bridge, seemingly in despair of his failure of killing the Moon, when Zuko steps out from the mist, walking toward him.

paragraphs.body: Aang races toward the fort wall, using waterbending to trap and stop Fire Nation soldiers along the way. He sends an airbending blast through the courtyard, opening a path through the battle forces, leading him right to the wall. At the top, he looks out at the vast Fire Nation fleet in the ocean.
paragraphs.text: Aang races toward the fort wall, using waterbending to trap and stop Fire Nation soldiers along the way. He sends an airbending blast through the courtyard, opening a path through the battle forces, leading him right to the wall. At the top, he looks out at the vast Fire Nation fleet in the ocean.
